description: Dealing with the refugee problem in the Middle East, including the difficulties faced by the children. As a result of armed conflict in 1948 in the Holy Land, nearly one million Arabs became refugees. This film shows the steps taken by the United Nations Relief and Works Agency to help in educating and resettling these people.
